parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system malfunction can cause the vehicle to lose motive power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded. It can also increase the risk of a fire due to thermal overload or overheating of the high-voltage battery.
symptoms: The vehicle displays error messages such as "Electrical System Malfunction: Safely Stop the Vehicle" or "Electrical System Malfunction - Please contact service"
the vehicle loses motive power
unknown warning lights are illuminated
the vehicle fails to restart
and the high-voltage battery may experience a loss of range and/or performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The high-voltage battery overheating can increase the risk of a fire, causing damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: The vehicle displays error messages related to electrical system malfunction
the high-voltage battery may experience a loss of range and/or performance
and the vehicle may emit smoke or catch fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The compact/portable charging system failure can cause overheating of the home wiring, leading to permanent damage to the house socket and charging cable, and increasing the risk of a fire.
symptoms: The charger overheats
trips the breaker
and damages the wall outlet and breaker.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front motor failure can cause the vehicle to lose motive power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle displays error messages related to electrical system malfunction
the vehicle loses motive power
and the motor turns off while the vehicle is in motion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective electric vehicle chargers can cause inconvenience and financial loss to the consumer, as well as safety risks due to overheating or electrical malfunction.
symptoms: The charger becomes defective after several months of use
fails to work despite customer service assistance
and the manufacturer refuses to refund the cost of purchase and replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The air conditioning system failure can cause inconvenience and discomfort to the driver and passengers, as well as financial loss due to repair costs and loss of vehicle use.
symptoms: The air conditioning system fails
the vehicle is out of service for an extended period
and the dealer refuses to reimburse the lease payment for the time the vehicle is out of service.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system malfunction can cause the vehicle to shut down suddenly, leading to a loss of propulsion power, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on busy highways, and put occupants and other road users at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle displays an error message "Electrical system: malfunction! Safely stop vehicle"
the vehicle shuts down suddenly
loss of forward propulsion power
inability to steer or control the vehicle
the vehicle becomes stuck in the middle of the road or intersection
and the accelerator pedal does not respond.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the motor can cause the vehicle to shut down suddenly, leading to a loss of propulsion power, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on busy highways, and put occupants and other road users at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle displays an error message "Electrical system: malfunction! Safely stop vehicle"
the vehicle shuts down suddenly
loss of forward propulsion power
inability to steer or control the vehicle
the vehicle becomes stuck in the middle of the road or intersection
and the accelerator pedal does not respond.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The coolant infiltration into the motor can cause the motor to fail, leading to a loss of propulsion power, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on busy highways, and put occupants and other road users at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle displays an error message "Electrical system: malfunction! Safely stop vehicle"
the vehicle shuts down suddenly
loss of forward propulsion power
inability to steer or control the vehicle
the vehicle becomes stuck in the middle of the road or intersection
and the accelerator pedal does not respond.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The drive system malfunction can cause the vehicle to shut down suddenly, leading to a loss of propulsion power, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially on busy highways, and put occupants and other road users at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle displays an error message "Electrical system: malfunction! Safely stop vehicle"
the vehicle shuts down suddenly
loss of forward propulsion power
inability to steer or control the vehicle
the vehicle becomes stuck in the middle of the road or intersection
and the accelerator pedal does not respond.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electric vehicle charging system can cause a fire hazard, potentially damaging the vehicle and surrounding property, and posing a risk to the safety of the occupants and bystanders.
symptoms: The charger fails
burns
or overheats
causing damage to the charging point or surrounding electrical system.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Leak into the Vehicle Cabin
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water leakage into the vehicle cabin can cause electrical system failures, corrosion, and potentially lead to a fire, compromising the safety of the occupants.
symptoms: Water tracks inside the car cabin
potentially entering the electrical system
causing corrosion
and electrical system failures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of AM radio, a standard feature for over 50 years, can compromise the safety of drivers by limiting their access to important traffic and road condition updates, potentially leading to accidents or other safety issues.
symptoms: The vehicle does not have an AM radio feature
despite being a standard feature in most vehicles
and the sales and service representatives are unaware of its omission.
